english_example_sentence: When you were young, you used to write long letters every day.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты был молод, ты каждый день писал длинные письма.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen gençken her gün uzun mektuplar yazardın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen gençken her gün uzun mektuplar ______.
